text: What third-party libraries are the biggest show stoppers for Python 3.x?
One of the main obstacles preventing people from moving to Python 3 are third-party libraries which have not yet been ported.
What library is the biggest show stopper for you?

lis.text: I will flag this post to be made a community wiki since answering takes very little effort and upvoting shall mean "I'm waiting for this lib as well" and not "Wow, great answer!"
